definition: to throw/to fling/to swing/to leave behind/to throw off/to dump (sb)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The rod is coiled by means of centrifugal (laying head).
sentences.chinese: 繞杆方式爲離心甩頭式。

sentences.english: That I would never get dizzy no matter how much I head bang.
sentences.chinese: 不管我甩頭多少次都不會覺得眩暈。

sentences.english: And the lion in the water shook his mane and showed his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，水中的獅子也甩了甩頭上的鬃毛露出了牙齒。

sentences.english: Suddenly he emerged from the river and threw water off.
sentences.chinese: 突然他從河裏冒出來，甩了甩頭上的水。

sentences.english: He forced the shook, want to clear my head.
sentences.chinese: 他用力的甩了甩頭，想讓自己的頭腦清醒了一下。

sentences.english: I shake my head and it goes out on my fur .
sentences.chinese: 我甩一甩頭藥水就跑到外面了。
